description: A smoky BBQ flavoured beef noodle dish with crispy onions.
name: Shredded Beef Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced
2 medium capsicum, de-seeded and finely diced
400g noodles, cooked as per packet instructions

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large non-stick pan to a medium heat and then add the sesame oil.
Fry the shredded beef for 10 minutes while turning.
Add the onion, capsicum and garlic to the pan and continue to fry for a further 4 minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients apart from the crispy onions to the pan and combine fully.
Cook the noodles as per packet instructions and then drain and add to the pan.
Fry and combine all ingredients while tossing for 3 minutes before serving.
